name: Hitech Electronix
overview:
Established in the year 1986, we, “Hitech Electronix”, are one of the most recognized organization completely engaged in manufacturing of Educational Equipment and Instruments to Engineering Colleges, Polytechnics, ITI’s, Science Colleges etc.

Our Team: Electronic & Mechanical Engineers Sales & Services Engineers Quality control analysts

Infrastructure: We have a state-of-the-art infrastructure, which is equipped with the most integrated facilities for the production and delivery of a wide range of Educational Equipment and Instruments suitable for Engineering Colleges, Polytechnics, ITI’s, Science Colleges etc.

Client Satisfaction: With the commitment to develop good quality of Educational Equipment and instruments. We have been able to build a numerous customers across the region. Our professionals make sure that the products offered by our company are reliable, which have high functionality for their easy operation and low maintenance

Why Us?: Ability to meet the requirements of the customers Best price offered in the market Strict adherence to the industrial norms State-of-the-art infrastructure Top-notch quality products
